sentences: Stressing the need to enter into full negotiating mode, AWG-LCA Chair Michael Zammit Cutajar (Malta) opened the session and parties adopted the agenda ( FCCC/AWGLCA/2009/6 ).
On the organization of work ( FCCC/AWGLCA/2009/7 ), parties agreed to a first reading of the negotiating text in an informal plenary.
AWG-LCA Chair Zammit Cutajar said the next steps would be decided after the first reading.
Parties agreed to informal consultations on the legal form of the outcome and further organization of work.
